title: HTML
author: Harold Edmond
description: HTML is a language that is used to create web pages and web applications. It provides the framework for CSS, which is used for styling, and for JavaScript, which is used to impact web page functionality

title: CSS
author: Ruby Irene
description: CSS is a web development languange that is used to style websites. CSS effects the layout, color, placement, text, margins, and much more for each element of a webpage.

title: JavaScript
author: Minerva June
description: JavaScript is the most popular programming language in use and it is used to control web site functionality. It is flexible and used for both front-end and back-end web development.

title: Node.js
author: Harold Edmond
description: Node.js is a valuable tool because it allows users to write JavaScript for a server. NodeJS allows JavaScript to be used on the front-end and back-end of web development.

title: Express
author: Ruby Irene
description: Express is a popular Node.js web framework written using JavaScript. It is used to write handlers for route requests, insert data, set ports and template locations, and process middleware.
